name: Mr. Jorkmon In Trouble
description:
'Mr. Jorkmon In Trouble' is a short and first-person horror game that is made on 3 sleepless nights. The game tells a little and weird event about someone who is an old gastroenterologist.

Gameplay

You, as a journalist, will be playing the game in Mr. Jorkmon's apartment. Your purpose is to know what is happening with him because people say that his patient's ghost haunts him. 

You exactly have no idea what you will face! Controls MovementW,A,S,DInteractLeft ClickFocusX

Follow me on Twitter!

Wearing Headphones is recommended!
